effect.shortEffect: Raises Speed and lowers Defense by one stage each upon being hit by a physical move.
effect.full: Whenever a physical move hits this Pokémon, its Speed rises one stage and its Defense falls one stage. This ability triggers on every hit of a multiple-hit move.

description.black-white: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
description.black-2-white-2: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
description.x-y: Physical attacks lower its Defense stat and raise its Speed stat.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Physical attacks lower its Defense stat and raise its Speed stat.
description.sun-moon: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
description.sword-shield: Physical attacks to the Pokémon lower its Defense stat but sharply raise its Speed stat.
